PERSONAL STATEMENT
I am a single- driven and goal oriented graduand from Kabarak University school of business 
seeking a challenging career position and professional development in business, finance and 
related strategies. I strive to gain satisfaction in an environment that encourages innovation, 
teamwork and attention to detail towards delivering quality service and making a difference in the 
world.
